players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Charlie was found dead on the first night. Let's be cautious and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
You: "I suggest we keep a close eye on each other tonight. With Charlie out of the game, it's important that we ensure everyone's safety."
Diana: "Let's all be cautious and keep an eye on each other tonight. We don't know who the mafioso is yet, so it's better to be safe than sorry."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's all be cautious and keep an eye on each other tonight to ensure everyone's safety."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
